sourcesContent:
import "./post.css"; import { MoreVert as MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; export default function Post({ post }) { return (
{Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like}
{post.comment}
); }
